entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #55676
  • Perf regression: endpoint, json, plaintext #55675
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #55674
  • Explicitly calling `context.Fail(....)` in authorization policy requirement handler results in empty `policyAuthorizationResult.AuthorizationFailure.FailedRequirements` #55673
  • Performance Challenges of Blazor Server Applications in Low Bandwidth Environments Compared to MVC and Traditional Web Applications #55671
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mapaction, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #55670
  • Perf regression: json, json, mvc #55669
  • Perf improvement: caching, json, mapaction #55667

Closed

  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #55626
    9.0-preview5
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55621
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55620
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55622
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55623

  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55642
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55643
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #55644
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #55646

  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55668
  • HttpRequest.BodyReader.TryRead returns false even though request has a body #55615

PullRequests

Created

  • Make DefaultProblemDetailsFactory public #55666
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Updated

  • UnixCertificateManager: implement IsTrusted. #55335
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
